message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $13,000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
